page.title: 08HOME-LIFE
page.content: MY DAY-MARGARET FERGUSON(11 years) When I get up in the morning I get dressed,make my bed and have breakfast I am collected and conveyed to school in the school car. At week-ends we either help Mum in the house with the housework or help Dad doing something up in the fields.When we help Mum we usually have to dust or hoover,clean the bathroom,wash dishes or tidy our bedrooms.If we are helping Dadwe help him with the following tasks:fencing,tidying up the shed,sorting out potatoes,dosing the lambs or anything else which needs done on the croft.My sister and I have to help my Dad because he works in Bowmore Distillery during the day and runs the croft in the evenings and at week-ends.I also look after the 2 dogs,6 ducks and 4 bantams.
